text:
If you are having issues with the extenstion, and you getting 429 error please post here. https://github.com/Ordinath/Whisper_to_ChatGPT/issues/12

and send and an email to them ordinath@proton.me.
Awesome but just stopped working, API key error :(

its a game changer, it works!
i dont know what the 'prompt' thing is i just remove it.
the short cut works too
i love how it doesnt overwrite the whole prompt when i use this extension
The downside of the app is that if you want to use it outside ChatGPT on other websites, I don't think it's possible.

It would be helpful if you provided some more information on how to configure it.
I just added the OpenAI key, but I keep receiving the message: "429 ERROR! API key not provided or OpenAI Server Error! Check the Pop-up window of the Extension to provide API key." when I click on the microphone to record.
works as expected, thanks!

This is a fantastic application,  It's been working flawlessly. but I seriously need your help. TODAY The error message has changed and I've updated the API key, and I wonder if it's to do with the new changes that OpenAI have announced since their keynote this month. Are you able to get back to me at all, please, developer?  the error is 400 ERROR! API key not provided or OpenAI Server Error! Check the Pop-up window of the Extension to provide API key. the screenshot is: https://i.imgur.com/... Show more
works perfectly

Throws an error:

"429 ERROR! API key not provided or OpenAI Server Error! Check the Pop-up window of the Extension to provide API key."

(both with paid and free Openai accounts API keys)
Please create an extension that we can use as a text input, not just for chat.openai.com but for any other text field. It would be MASSIVE!
Seems to work well for me when I'm wondering if the developer could make it so we can use this transcription service on any website?
shortcut key not working
Doesn't do anything at all.

I don't understand why this application is so unknown. I have tried various applications with speech-to-text functionality, and this one is the only application that directly accesses whisper AI and transcribes everything without any issues. All the other applications I have tried do not achieve the high quality of this application.

Feature Request: Currently, the application only works on ChatGPT. It would certainly not be a problem to expand the application so that it functions in the enti... Show more
Does quite well what it is suppose to do!
Works and does not overload the visual interface. Do not need anything else. Great!

Very good extension, it's simple and Whisper works like magic. Having said that, it would be nice to have some useability upgrades, such as:

1. The option to send the message automatically after recording (just this feature alone would make this extension worth rating the full 5 stars)
2. The option to press and hold the button (or the shortcut key) to record, and then releasing the key to stop recording.

I couldn't really understand the limits of using the API (either with Whisper or ChatGPT), I'm not too familiar with that, so I can't really speak to it. but.. that's a MUST HAVE. For now this has been awesome to use!

I love this extension. I use it daily for ChatGPT as Whisper has the best voice recognition by far. It's been working perfectly until today, 4/14/23. I emailed the developer. Once it's back up and working it's five stars all day.
It has been working very well until today. Now the black microphone doesn't appear and I can't use it. I tried reinstalling, and still doesn't work. Please fix this bug.
great~! go on to text-to-speech~!!
